actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.

official_title: A bill for relief of Richard M. Barlow of Santa Fe, New Mexico.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay a specified sum to a named individual for compensation for losses incurred by such individual relating to and a direct consequence of: (1) personnel actions taken by the Department of Defense affecting such individual's employment at the Department during a specified period; and (2) such individual's separation from service with such Department. Exempts the payment from Federal, State, or local income taxes.

titles.title: A bill for relief of Richard M. Barlow of Santa Fe, New Mexico.
